div.p: UV/IR/UV spectrum of PVE–MeOH in the range of 3520–3750 cm −1; excitation laser: 36741 cm −1, ionizing laser: 31847 cm −1, carrier gas helium; the lower trace shows the calculated OH stretching frequencies at the SCS-CC2/def2-TZVP level for the optimized S 0 and S 1 structure of the OH–O’ isomer scaled by 0.9635.
